column2: BB, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Horrible pill! Acne worse, gained 10 lbs in 3months, emotional wreck, non stop bleeding, & horrible cramping. Waste of my time & money. Not to mention the doctor won't take my symptoms seriously!

column2: crystala, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I never got pregnant while using this pill, but I doubled up by using condoms 90% of the time.  The reason I stopped taking this pill was that it caused me yeast infections at least once a month.  I am 30 and had never experienced a yeast infection before.  I panicked and had an STD test, but thankfully it was just my body reacting negatively with the estrogen in this pill.  After 7 months I switched to Camila.  No more yeast infections and light/no period.

column2: KaylaT123, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This has been the best birthcontrol i have ever took. I highly recommend this.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I started taking Cyclen four years ago when I was 18. The only side effect I had experienced was weight gain (15 pounds.) Recently, mood swings, lack of energy and lack of sex drive have developed. I am considering not taking any sort of birth control after researching and finding so many side effects with all.

column2: debbie, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been on this to help put my hormones back in check. I think for the most part it does not bother me. I do have stomach pains, but I cannot say for sure if it is from this drug. I am on many meds. However, I was shocked to see how big my breast are getting. It is almost a good thing, but they hurt a bit as a result.

column2: Sephiesmom25, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been on this drug for 5 months now and I have gained more than 10 lbs. And I am always tired even right after I wake up. I am calling my Doc to see if there is something else i can be put on.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I was put on this pill to regulate my periods. I worked for a couple months. Now I am back to having irregular periods. If it was for me not wanting to get pregnant,I would be off of it. This pill is the worst.

column2: mo, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: i have not gotten pregnant, but the side effects are not worth it. I am taking myself off this medication this month. depression mood swings, nausea.  there has to be a better way. I can tell you exactly how i am going to feel before i wake up in the morning, based on were i am in my pill pack.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I also expereince nearly every side effect of this pill.  I have gained about 7 lbs the first month (and I'm a tiny girl!.  My breasts have grown about an entire cup size and I have daily abdominal pain.  No babies though!

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have pretty much had every side effect listed about this pill.  I have had abdominal pain, weight gain, my breasts did not only get bigger- THEY ARE HUGE!, I have nausea caused by galstones and painful periods. I am not a hypochondriac and did not even read the side effects until several  minutes ago.
